#### <s class="topic-title">[[Anahata Chakra]]</s>

Situated at our [[solar plexus]] or the middle of our upper back, it is the heart [[Chakra]], which governs [[compassion]] and [[empathy]].

**See**:: [[Chakra]]
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
